system.description:
You come bearing the word of your divine patron. When you open your mouth, others listen. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you spend a use of Bardic Inspiration, choose one of the following options:
    • You or a creature within 30 feet of you regains hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.
    • A creature within 30 feet of you must save against your cleric spell save DC or take radiant or necrotic damage (your choice when you use this benefit) equal to your proficiency bonus.
    • Your AC increases by 2 until the beginning of your next turn.
  • When you use Channel Divinity, you regain a use of Bardic Inspiration. This stacks with the similar feature from Choir Director, meaning you now recover uses of Bardic Inspiration equal to half your proficiency bonus +1 when using it.
  • Choose one of the following: either you receive another inexperienced follower of the Diviner, Healer, or Minstrel type or the follower you received from the Choir Director feat becomes seasoned.
